solution_line_template: Each carton has an area of {carton_width}*{carton_length}*{carton_height} = <<{carton_width}*{carton_length}*{carton_height}={carton_volume}>>{carton_volume} square inches.
Each shipping box has an area of {box_width}*{box_length}*{box_height} = <<{box_width}*{box_length}*{box_height}={box_volume}>>{box_volume} square inches
The total number of cartons that will fit into each box is {box_volume}/{carton_volume} = <<{box_volume}/{carton_volume}={num_cartons_per_box}>>{num_cartons_per_box}

Since there are {widgets_per_carton} widgets in each carton, the total number of cartons in each box will be {widgets_per_carton}*{num_cartons_per_box} = <<{widgets_per_carton}*{num_cartons_per_box}={total_widgets_per_box}>>{total_widgets_per_box}
